content: made with twisted fiber art allowing the yarn to do the heavy lifting this scarf has an open style pattern to allow for flow and drape great for beginners and a quick work up for gifting too you can get the free version now on the blog here https //www stitchandhustle com/free-patterns/lexington-shawlette-scarf-free-crochet-pattern pattern is in the november issue of happily hooked magazine coming out november 1 2018 get it here http //bit ly/gethappilyhooked
